1)Owner should first sign up and login to your account then your class will get a unique class Id 
2)Owner Should create accounts for staffs by using their email id and set a password 
3)Share the password and class id to the respective staff which admin had set while creating their account

1)Get Class ID and Password from admin and then login to your account using Email id,Class Id and Password 
2)Add Subjects and Batches of your class by clicking on the '+' button located at bottom right corner 
3)Add Subjects to the respective batches 
4)After that create accounts for students and teachers 
5)Now you can schedule lectures,schedule tests and manage data of students and teachers 
6)Staff can send notifications to students of a particular batch and also to a particular teacher 
7)If a student has left the class then you can mark student as inactive and then you can also see there data in past student data 
8)If a teacher teaches multiple subjects then that teacher will have different accounts for different subjects

3)Teachers can get doubts of students and teachers can reply to students by sending email using Gmail
